item.title: ScyllaDB Manager 2.2: Repair Revisited
item.description: This blog post has been first published in ScyllaDB blog. We released ScyllaDB Manager 1.0 to help our users manage repairs in February 2018. Since then a lot of things have changed. We added the row-level repair to ScyllaDB Open Source NoSQL Database, and to the Enterprise version this year. We just released ScyllaDB Manager 2.2 with a new repair method optimized for row-level repair. New repair features in ScyllaDB Manager 2.
